member.name: T:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection
member.summary: Connection class for intercepting G/M/T-codes from the control server

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new connection in intercepting mode

member.name: P:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.Mode
member.summary: Mode of the interceptor

member.name: P:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.Channels
member.summary: List of input channels where codes may be intercepted. If the list is empty, all available channels are used

member.name: P:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.Filters
member.summary: List of G/M/T-codes to filter or Q0 for comments
member.remarks: This may only specify the code type and major/minor number (e.g. G1)

member.name: P:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.PriortyCodes
member.summary: Defines if priority codes may be intercepted (e.g. M122 or M999)

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.Connect(DuetAPI.Connection.InterceptionMode,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Establishes a connection to the given UNIX socket file
member.param: Path to the UNIX socket file
member.exception: Init message could not be processed

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.Connect(DuetAPI.Connection.InterceptionMode,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{DuetAPI.CodeChannel},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Boolean,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Establishes a connection to the given UNIX socket file
member.param: Optional list of input channels where codes may be intercepted
Optional list of codes that may be intercepted
Define if priorty codes may be intercepted
Path to the UNIX socket file
member.exception: Init message could not be processed

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.ReceiveCode(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Wait for a code to be intercepted and read it
member.returns: Code being intercepted or null if the connection has been closed

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.CancelCode(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Instruct the control server to cancel the last received code (in intercepting mode)

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.InterceptConnection.IgnoreCode(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Instruct the control server to ignore the last received code (in intercepting mode)

member.summary: Instruct the control server to resolve the last received code with the given message details (in intercepting mode)

member.summary: Protected constructor for derived modes that can issue regular commands

member.summary: Add a new third-party HTTP endpoint in the format /machine/{ns}/{path}
member.param: Whether this is an upload request
member.returns: Wrapper around the UNIX socket for accepting HTTP endpoint requests
member.exception: UNIX socket could not be opened

member.summary: Add a new user session
member.param: Origin of the user session (e.g. IP address)
Origin of the user session (e.g. WebSocket port). Defaults to the current PID

member.summary: Wait for all pending codes of the given channel to finish
member.returns: True if all pending codes could be flushed

member.summary: Constructor for a new connection dealing with a single HTTP endpoint request

member.remarks: DCS may create new connections and close them immediately again to check if the UNIX socket is still active

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.SubscribeConnection.GetMachineModelPatch(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Receive a (partial) machine model update. If the subscription mode is set to , new update patches of the object model need to be applied manually. This method is intended to receive such fragments.
